name: Nacho, Buffalo & Cheddar Chicken Dip
description: This dip brings the heat and just might be the best buffalo chicken dip recipe ever! Perfect for game day or long weekends, just make sure to have beers or pitchers of iced tea on standby.

ingredients.name: Southwest Ranch Dressing Mix or Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
Cajun Fries Seasoning or Buffalo Seasoning

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 350° F.
  2. In Multipurpose Steamer, soften cream cheese in microwave for 30 seconds.
  3. Add all remaining ingredients and stir well.
  4. Transfer into a large baker and bake in oven for 20 min or until bubbly.
  5. Serve with nachos or crackers.
